abstract: Actor Steve Guttenberg and his girlfriend Emily Smith say what they love most about their Upper West Side rental is taupe sofa bed that friends and family use during visits; couple also say cozy apartment brings them closer.

headline.print_headline: A Little House in the Sky
headline.main: Steve Guttenberg’s Little Home in the Sky

snippet: The actor and his girlfriend, Emily Smith, live in a one-bedroom near Lincoln Center....
lead_paragraph: The actor and his girlfriend, Emily Smith, live in a one-bedroom near Lincoln Center.
